Package recognizer

Class Summary
LIWCDictionary Interface to the LIWC dictionary, implementing patterns for each LIWC category based on the LIWC.CAT file.
PersonalityRecognizer The program computes features described in (Mairesse et al., 2007) given a text, and it runs Weka models on the features to produce personality scores for all Big Five dimensions.
Utils Library of program-independent static methods.
